activity.name: Louvre Museum
activity.description: World-famous art museum home of the Mona Lisa.

activity.name: Palace of Versailles
activity.description: One of the most famous palaces in the world, former residence of King Louis XIV.

activity.name: Musée d’Orsay
activity.description: Beautiful museum next to the Seine. French art from 1848-1914

activity.name: Eiffel Tower
activity.description: The iconic landmark of the city, a must-go

activity.name: Seine River
activity.description: 776 km long, the Seine crosses the city. You can take boat rides, cross its many bridges and enjoy the environment the city of love brings.

activity.name: Moulin Rouge
activity.description: One of France's most traditional Cabarets, elegant, extravagant, and glamorous: a true show-stopper.

activity.name: Sacré Couer
activity.description: Sacré-Cœur Basilica is a Roman Catholic church and minor basilica, dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus, in Paris, France.

activity.name: Paris is Burning
activity.description: Experience the vibrant and historic side of Paris with the "Paris is Burning" tour. This unforgettable journey takes you to two of the city's most iconic landmarks: the legendary Moulin Rouge.

activity.name: Sacré Couer
activity.description: Sacré-Cœur Basilica is a Roman Catholic church and minor basilica, dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus, in Paris, France.

activity.name: Moulin Rouge
activity.description: One of France's most traditional Cabarets, elegant, extravagant, and glamorous: a true show-stopper.

activity.name: Historical Paris Walk
activity.description: Discover the rich history of Paris on the "Historical Paris Walk" tour. This immersive experience will take you through the city's most significant historical sites.

activity.name: Sacré Couer
activity.description: Sacré-Cœur Basilica is a Roman Catholic church and minor basilica, dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus, in Paris, France.

activity.name: Seine River
activity.description: 776 km long, the Seine crosses the city. You can take boat rides, cross its many bridges and enjoy the environment the city of love brings.

activity.name: Gourmet Paris
activity.description: Indulge in the finest French cuisine with the "Gourmet Paris" tour. Taste the best pastries, cheeses, and wines Paris has to offer.

city.name: Shanghai
city.description: A bustling metropolis known for its modern skyscrapers, historic landmarks, and vibrant cultural scene.

activity.name: The Bund
activity.description: Historic waterfront area showcasing colonial architecture and offering stunning views of the skyline across the Huangpu River.

activity.name: Shanghai Tower
activity.description: One of the tallest skyscrapers in the world, offering panoramic views of Shanghai from its observation deck.

activity.name: Longhua Temple
activity.description: Originally built in 242 AD, it was destroyed in war in 906 and later rebuilt. It consists of a very tall structure surrended by beautiful gardens and carrying a lot of history.

activity.name: Shanghai Museum
activity.description: Renowned museum featuring ancient Chinese art, ceramics, and artifacts, located in People's Square.

activity.name: Shanghai Circus World
activity.description: Unique and comparable to the tradition of Broadway, it is a stunning acrobatic show (which has elements performed in the Han dynasty (206BC–220AD)) combining traditional Chinese arts and modern technologies.

activity.name: Lost Heaven
activity.description: Popular restaurant serving Yunnanese cuisine in a stylish setting with traditional decor and live music.

city.name: Florence
city.description: Renowned for its art and architecture, Florence is a cultural hub in Italy.

activity.name: Florence Cathedral (Duomo)
activity.description: Iconic Renaissance cathedral known for its dome by Brunelleschi and its Giotto's Campanile.

activity.name: Uffizi Gallery
activity.description: Famous art museum featuring works by Botticelli, Michelangelo, Leonardo da Vinci, and more.

activity.name: Trattoria Mario
activity.description: Traditional trattoria serving authentic Tuscan cuisine in a casual atmosphere.

activity.name: Dante's House
activity.description: The location of the houses of the Alighieri family, the museum is arranged on three floors according to the three most important stages of Dante's life.

activity.name: Chapel of the Magi
activity.description: The Chapel of the Magi occupies an important place in the Medici Palace which Cosimo the Elder built, starting in about 1444, in accordance to the architectural design by Michelozzo di Bartolomeo.
activity.mostFamousWorks: Procession of the Magi - The Young Giuliano de Medici

activity.name: Botanical Garden
activity.description: The Gardens currently take up an area of 2.39 hectars, divided into smaller and larger avenues. The structure also has its own greenhouses and hot houses for the cultivation of special plants.

city.name: San Francisco
city.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks, hilly terrain, and diverse cultural attractions.

activity.name: Golden Gate Bridge
activity.description: Iconic suspension bridge connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean, offering stunning views and scenic walks.

activity.name: Alcatraz Island
activity.description: Former federal prison known for housing notorious criminals, now a popular tourist attraction offering tours of its historic facilities.

activity.name: The Slanted Door
activity.description: Acclaimed modern Vietnamese cuisine served in an elegant setting overlooking San Francisco Bay at the Ferry Building.

activity.name: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA)
activity.description: Modern and contemporary art museum showcasing a diverse collection of paintings, sculptures, and multimedia installations.

activity.name: Coit Tower
activity.description: Historic tower in the Telegraph Hill neighborhood offering panoramic views of San Francisco.

activity.name: Golden Gate Park
activity.description: Large urban park featuring gardens, museums, lakes, and recreational facilities.

activity.name: Tartine Bakery
activity.description: Renowned bakery offering artisanal bread, pastries, and sandwiches in a cozy, casual setting.

activity.name: Exploratorium
activity.description: Interactive science museum offering hands-on exhibits and educational programs for all ages.

activity.name: Orpheum Theatre
activity.description: Historic theater in downtown San Francisco hosting Broadway shows, concerts, and other performances.

activity.name: Lombard Street
activity.description: Famous winding road known for its eight sharp turns in one block, lined with beautiful flowers and houses.

activity.name: Presidio of San Francisco
activity.description: Historic park offering hiking trails, scenic overlooks, and museums, with views of the Golden Gate Bridge.

activity.name: Golden Gate Experience
activity.description: Discover the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and its surrounding areas with the "Golden Gate Experience" tour. This journey offers stunning views and a deep dive into the history of this world-famous landmark.

activity.name: Golden Gate Bridge
activity.description: Iconic suspension bridge connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean, offering stunning views and scenic walks.

activity.name: San Francisco Adventure
activity.description: Experience the thrill of San Francisco with the "San Francisco Adventure" tour. This action-packed tour includes exciting activities like biking across the Golden Gate Bridge and exploring the famous hills of the city.

city.name: Tulum
city.description: Historical Mayan city located on the coast of the Caribbean Sea, in the state of Quintana Roo, Mexico.

activity.name: Tulum Ruins
activity.description: Preserved Mayan ruins overlooking the Caribbean Sea, known for its beautiful setting and historical significance.

activity.name: Campanella Cremerie
activity.description: With delicious gelato, high-quality coffee made with beans from Veracruz, and waffles, Tulum’s most inviting cafe is a crowd favorite any time of day.

activity.name: La Negra Tomasa
activity.description: This spot is named after a song written by Cuban composer Guillermo Rodríguez Fiffe that was covered by Mexican rockers Caifanes in 1989, and like the song, this mod Sinaloan cevicheria is a little cumbia, a little rock and roll.

activity.name: Playa Paraíso
activity.description: Scenic beach with white sand and crystal-clear waters, perfect for relaxing and snorkeling.

activity.name: Gran Cenote
activity.description: Beautiful cenote with crystal-clear waters ideal for swimming and snorkeling, surrounded by lush vegetation.

city.name: Mumbai
city.description: India's financial powerhouse and home to Bollywood, with a mix of modern skyscrapers and historic colonial-era architecture.

activity.name: Gateway of India
activity.description: Iconic arch monument overlooking the Arabian Sea, built to commemorate the visit of King George V and Queen Mary to Mumbai in 1911.

activity.name: Prithvi Theatre
activity.description: Popular theatre venue known for promoting Hindi and English plays, established by Prithviraj Kapoor in 1944.

activity.name: Leopold Cafe
activity.description: Historic restaurant and bar popular among locals and tourists alike, known for its international menu and lively atmosphere.

activity.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
activity.description: Formerly known as the Prince of Wales Museum, this museum houses an extensive collection of art, archaeology, and natural history.
